name: Catalyst: Blind Faith
summary:
In an apocalyptic world where humanity is on the brink of extinction, not only do you determine how you explore the ruins that cover the land. You control and shape the fate of a young and troubled priest who can channel the power of any God in the pantheon through his weakened and fractured body.

While you seek a cure for the phenomenon turning mankind into demons— the Catalyst— you are encouraged to follow your heart.

Dive deep into a harrowing, action-packed, dark fantasy and horror visual novel, driven by a narrative that your choices create.
